segments.text: Ugh, what a sloppy mess in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, water cascading down everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman stands there, foot in the puddle, ignoring it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's fussing over a single plate while chaos brews.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor's getting soaked, probably ruining the wood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are making it worse with their antics.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on a teetering stool, hand in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's gross how they're sneaking treats amid the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching up, like it's a game.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole place will smell damp soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside garden looks clean, unlike this disaster inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand the carelessness here.
segments.speaker: PAR
